name: I'M OUT
description:
“I’M OUT” is a point and click made for the Completion Jam, hosted by Deynum on December 2020. Two persons made this game. Druidonyx made the art and half of the dialogues. And I (Nashoute) did the Prog/anim/Sound design.

Click on the road to move. Click on interface to change interactions or objects.

Use Escape to exit the game.

Languages available: English and French.

 

For the game we used unity, fmod, I2, Photoshop, visual studio code.

Part of the sounds is from "la sonotheque" : https://lasonotheque.org/

Don’t take it too seriously, it was made by two bored college students on a whim.
